about_the_game:
The Soundtrack of Riptale in 320kbps MP3 format. Includes intros, outros, looped versions of the stage tracks, and six bonus tracks. Over 30 minutes of music by Juha "Ianuarius" Keränen.

Tracklist:

1. Bells of Convocation (2:35)
2. Racing Blood (2:39)
3. Dance of Blades (2:43)
4. Deanimate (2:25)
5. Standard of the Forgotten (3:10)
6. Gray Summer Evening (1:57)
7. Lament of the Nameless (2:48)
8. Another Road (1:39)
9. Finally Free (1:15)
10. Path of Malevolence (Bonus Track) (0:50)
11. Reptile Racer (Bonus Track) (2:55)
12. Pogo Run (Bonus Track) (2:01)
13. One-Armed Bandit (Bonus Track) (1:02)
14. Whisper of Pages (Bonus Track) (1:29)
15. Sanctuary (Bonus Track) (1:12)
